index.title: Photos
index.description: Photographs i have taken both home and abroad on my travels. Photography is an inspiration to look at the world in a fresh and creative way.

slideshow.title: Mirror Lake, California
slideshow.alt: Composite of 4 images combined for higher resolution

slideshow.title: Sea Eagle, Malaysia
slideshow.alt: Caught flying quite close with a tele lens

slideshow.title: Joshua Tree, California
slideshow.alt: Casual shot lying comfortably in the middle of the road

slideshow.title: Posters, Berlin
slideshow.alt: A wall on the rail tracks caught my eye

slideshow.title: Elizabeth Bridge, Budapest
slideshow.alt: Shot in high contrast black and white

travel-map.title: World Travel Map
travel-map.description: Selected photographic waypoints for all the places I have visited around the world, plotted on a world map using GPS EXIF image data.
